input_email_body:
Subject: 

Dear Customer Support Team, I am writing to request information on data analytics tools that can optimize investment portfolios for financial companies You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. Could you please share some details about this? I would be grateful for any advice or suggestions you can provide My name is Carlos Mendoza.. Thank you for your time and support. I am eager to hear back from you soon.
